sense.def: Alternative Names lou ji 瘺疾 , fistula ailment; lou chuang 瘺瘡 , fistula sores; lou chuang 漏瘡 , leaking sores. Pathological Condition of tubular structures releasing pus and water from openings failing to close over a long period of time. They develop in the skin or in deep-lying regions of the body from festering scrofula or ulcers that have broken open. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 33: 若 膿汁不盡，多變成瘺也 , “If the flow of a purulent liquid fails to end, this often develops into fistula ”.
